azurerm_storage_table.description: Manages a Table within an Azure Storage Account.

name.description: The name of the storage table. Must be unique within the storage account the table is located.

storage_account_name.description: Specifies the storage account in which to create the storage table.

acl.description: One or more `acl` blocks as defined below.

id.description: The ID which should be used for this Shared Identifier.

expiry.description: The ISO8061 UTC time at which this Access Policy should be valid until.

permissions.description: The permissions which should associated with this Shared Identifier.

start.description: The ISO8061 UTC time at which this Access Policy should be valid from.

id.description: The ID of the Table within the Storage Account.

create.description: Used when creating the Storage Table.

update.description: Used when updating the Storage Table.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Storage Table.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Storage Table.
